title: for this years April fools...
body: can we replace all hitting sound effects with squeaky toy sounds ??????

replies.body: ah... i dunno if it's gonna be pegi T if illaoi gets picked that day.
But make Mundo Mundo's Q hit a terrifying scream, or double squeak toy
Tank wars would be _slightly_ more entertaining

Finally, a way I can bear getting 100-0'd by a {{champion:67}}:

Squeaky bolts.
It would make sense on {{champion:427}}  that mans auto attacks are already hilarious.
